message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM 

This paper proposes a novel approach to improve the structure of predicted segmentation masks using a semantic edge detection network. The paper focuses on semantic segmentation tasks and proposes a new loss function that can be integrated into any popular segmentation network without requiring additional annotation. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are computer vision (cs.CV), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and multimedia (cs.MM).
